node.title: Toddler drowns on Gold Coast beach, man found unresponsive on Sunshine Coast
node.description: A boy has died after a drowning incident at a Gold Coast beach, and a man has been taken to hospital on the Sunshine Coast after being found unresponsive in the water.
node.content:
["It's been a tragic\u00a0Christmas Eve on Queensland's beaches, with a three-year-old boy drowning on the\u00a0Gold Coast and an elderly man taken to hospital after being found unresponsive on a\u00a0Sunshine Coast beach.\u00a0\u00a0", "Paramedics, including critical care crews, were called to a Broadwater beach on Marine Parade in Labrador about 9:00am this morning to attend to the toddler.", "The boy was rushed in a critical condition to the Gold Coast University Hospital, where he later died.", "Meanwhile, an elderly man has been transported to hospital after being found unresponsive at a Sunshine Coast beach earlier\u00a0this morning.", "A Queensland Ambulance spokesperson said the\u00a0man was in a critical condition when paramedics, including the critical care team, arrived at the mouth of the Maroochy River.", "It is understood he was found by lifeguards after members of the public raised the alarm.", "The man was transported to the Sunshine Coast University Hospital in a critical condition about 8am.", "
Boy critical after dog bite
", "In a separate incident, a boy\u00a0on the Gold Coast was taken to hospital this morning with critical injuries after being bitten by a dog.", "The primary-school-aged boy was bitten at a private address at Varsity Lakes this morning.", "Paramedics attended the scene before midday, where the boy was taken to Gold Coast University Hospital in a critical condition.\u00a0", "More to come."]
